Texts.Chs: 但并不意味着不喜欢。友好的，因为猎人。竞争是激烈的，而且有很好的乐趣。我们竞争，看谁是更好的猎人。
Texts.Eng: But is not mean dislike. Friendly, because hunters. Compete is keen, and makes for good fun. We compete and see who better hunter is.

Texts.Chs: 耳廓狐对叶族人的看法
叶族人说话也很奇怪。总是指整个种族而不是自我。为什么？解释一下？没有人让他们改变语言，但耳廓狐希望说标准？ 解释一下。所需信息。此外，叶族人是植物喜欢肉食，他们从来不需要洗澡。 一直闻起来像腐烂的肉。 我们不喜欢。
Texts.Eng: Floran also talk strange. Referring always to entire race and not self. Why? Explain? None make them change tongue, but Fenerox expected to speak Standard? Explain. Required needed information. Also, meat diet of Florans and being plant, them never need bathe. Smelling like rotten meat all time. We dislike.

Texts.Chs: 鼠族人向我们介绍了叶族人。不知道为什么。一开始看起来像我们一样，总是打猎，总是更加坚韧。除了一件事。植物。植物是如何进行狩猎的？为什么植物会狩猎？在故乡，植物是用来尿肥和浆果的。不是杀人。
Texts.Eng: Kirhos introduced us to Florans. Unsure why. Seem like us at first, always hunt, always tougher. Except one thing. Plants. How is plants make hunt? Why is plants make hunt? On homeworld, plants is for urine and berries. Not killing.
